message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $12,000.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500, but that's the best I can do. This is a great deal for you, considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to meet you at $10,500. My maximum budget remains at $9,000. I hope we can find a middle ground that suits us both.
